title: Register a card to a platform user's account.

___client_ip.description: The IP address of the person making the purchase.

___account_identifier.description: The identifier for the platform account to fund.

___credit_card.description: Details of the credit card being used to fund the account.

___expiration.description: The expiration date of the credit card in YYYY-MM format.

___number.description: The credit card number, preferably numbers only.

___security_code.description: The 3 or 4-digit card security code (CVV2, CVC2, or CID).

___billing_address.description: The billing address associated with the credit card.

___f_name.description: The first name associated with the customer's billing address.

___l_name.description: The last name associated with the customer's billing address.

___state.description: The state of the customer's billing address. Up to 40 characters (no symbols) or a FIPS state alpha code (e.g. AL, WA, etc).

___zip.description: The postal code of the customer's billing address.

___address.description: The billing address. For multi-line addresses append subsequent lines to the first.

___country.description: The country of the customer's billing address.

___city.description: The city of the customer's billing address.
